participant_1.background:
I enjoy picking wild strawberries with my son on our weekend camping trips.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.
i used to wear a cape.
my guilty pleasure is mcdonald.

participant_2.background:
I love my pets and my job, and I'm always looking for new ways to express my creativity with bold hair colors.
i was once offered to play basketball professionally.
my family came from greece in the 1950s.
I eat my feelings.
i am an avid quilter.

content.text: Hey! I'm so excited to meet you! I love meeting new people.
Hello there! I'm excited to meet you too! What are some of your interests?
I love to spend time outdoors, especially camping! I also love to cook and bake. What about you?
I love animals and spending time with my pets! I also love to quilt and express my creativity with bold hair colors.
That's so cool! I used to wear a cape when I was younger, but I don't think I'd be able to pull it off now!
Haha, I'm sure you could! I think it's really important to be yourself and not let anyone tell you who you are.
I completely agree! I think it's important to be confident and to show your true colors.
I'm glad we agree! I think it's important to be surrounded by people who support and encourage you to be yourself.
I totally agree! I'm lucky to have a lot of great friends who are always there for me.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! I'm glad we met!
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
